thread.title: Highly Profitable Online Based Business

title: Highly Profitable Online Based Business
text: Questions Business Summary This is a very profitable online-based real estate investing training and coaching business. A diverse line of products that teach investors creative strategies and implementation technologies. The products are ''evergreen'' having a long-term and broad appeal. In addition to the online sales of training products, there is a high-end coaching program offered to the customers - which is completely outsourced and nets the sellers over $500K annually. Long standing relationships with other vendors provide excellent service and produce great results. All outsourced vendors have assured the seller that they are very willing and eager to continue. Sellers are active approximately 20 hours per week. Could easily be an absentee owner situation. This business can be operated from anywhere. Business has shown increasing revenue and there are many untapped opportunities. Seller will provide transitional training and excellent terms for the right buyer. Call Maggie 619-890-0859 for Details. Asking Price NOW ONLY: $975,000 - Seller Financing Available:$500,000 DP; Balance SCN for 24 months at 6% interest. Financials
